# Getting started

## About this manual

This manual is a step-by-step user guide to the `traits.build` standard, R package and workflow manual. Alongside [traits.build manual (this website)](http://traitecoevo.github.io/traits.build/index.html), you may find the following resources useful:

- [package installation instructions](http://traitecoevo.github.io/traits.build/index.html#installation)
- a [reference page with all user-side functions](http://traitecoevo.github.io/traits.build/reference/index.html). 
- links to [example projects](usage_examples.html)
